title: Techie Atul Subhash's Son To Stay With His Mother, Supreme Court Decides
content: The Supreme Court on Monday afternoon directed the son of Atul Subhash - the Bengaluru techie who died by suicide - and Nikita Singhania - his estranged wife, whom he had accused of harassment leading to his death - be produced before it.

title: RG Kar Case Convict Gets Life Term, Judge Says Case "Not Rarest Of Rare"
content: RG Kar Hospital Rape-Murder Convict Sanjay Roy Gets Life Sentence

title: "When Sun Sets Tomorrow...": Trump's Big Vows Before Taking Over As President
content: Addressing his thousands of supporters who braved long waits in freezing temperatures, rain and snow to attend a "victory rally" on Sunday, President-elect Donald Trump promised to swiftly fulfil the central promise of his presidential campaign.

title: Donald Trump Inauguration LIVE: 200 Executive Orders On Trump's Day 1 Agenda
content: Donald Trump Presidential Inauguration LIVE Updates: Donald Trump will be sworn in as the 47th President of the United States on Monday at 12 pm local time (10:30 IST) at a ceremony held inside the Rotunda of the US Capitol.

title: Kerala Woman, Who Killed Boyfriend With Poisoned Drink, Sentenced To Death
content: In 2022, Greeshma poisoned her boyfriend with an ayurvedic tonic laced with paraquat, a herbicide.

title: UPI Payment For Paratha: How Cops Caught Saif Ali Khan Attack Suspect
content: Undone by a paratha. And the digital payments infrastructure. That was how Shariful Islam Shehzad, the man accused of stabbing Saif Ali Khan six times - in a suspected attempted burglary incident - was tracked down and arrested by Mumbai Police.

title: "If Case Stayed With Us...": Mamata Banerjee Reacts To RG Kar Case Verdict
content: Kolkata Police would have ensured death penalty for the convict in RG Kar rape and murder case, but the probe was taken away and handed over to the CBI, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee said today

title: "Hundreds Of Patients On Footpath": Rahul Gandhi Writes To Centre, Atishi
content: Rahul Gandhi has written to Health Minister JP Nadda and Delhi Chief Minister Atishi, flagging the plight of hundreds of patients and their family members huddled on the footpath outside AIIMS and sought concrete steps to resolve the crisis.

title: Curious Case Of Chandratara: Elephant With Cross-Border Ownership Claims
content: A domesticated elephant is at the centre of a cross-border ownership claim.

title: Hyderabad Man Shot Dead In US, Was Looking For A Job
content: A man from Hyderabad was shot dead in the United States on Monday in a suspected firing by assailants in Washington DC.

title: Iran Sentences Pop Singer To Death For "Insulting" Prophet Muhammed
content: An Iranian court has sentenced popular singer Amir Hossein Maghsoudloo, known as Tataloo, to death on appeal after he was convicted of blasphemy.

title: Gavaskar Hits Bullseye, Explains Reason Behind Samson Champions Trophy Snub
content: Sanju Samson has played just 16 ODIs in nearly a decade, scoring 510 runs at an average of 56.66 and a strike-rate of 99.60 with a hundred and three fifties to show for his efforts.

title: From Saddam To Shivshankar: Muslim Man Converts To Hinduism To Marry Lover
content: A 34-year-old Muslim man here converted to Hinduism to marry his girlfriend with whom he had an affair for the past 10 years, changing his name from Saddam to Shivshankar, police said on Monday.

title: Lucknow Super Giants Announce New Captain For IPL 2025: "Best Player..."
content: Indian cricket team wicket-keeper batter Rishabh Pant has been appointed Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) skipper for the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 season.

title: Stalin writes to Union Education Minister, CMs of non-BJP-ruled States against draft UGC regulations
